```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

Load our package and others we need:

```{r setup}
library(informalr)
library(knitr)
library(tibble)
```

Put our names in a tibble:

```{r}
table <- tibble(
  name = c("Anne", "Richel"),
  github_username = c(
    "fastnotfurious", 
    get_richels_github_username()
  )
)
kable(table)
```
